data.text:
The objective of BHUAF is to promote education and research among BHUâs students and faculty by supporting students and faculty. Scholarships will be created to encourage deserving students. It will provide funds to faculty for their research, teaching, and professional growth, and building research labs. It will support collaboration and research between faculty and students of BHU and educational and research organizations in the USA and elsewhere. BHU also aims to promote and facilitate research projects between BHU faculty and industrial organizations in the USA.
